input2:
The patient reports yesterday she developed epigastric pain 
following lunch (prosciutto, tomato). Associated with this was nausea and non-bloody emesis (vomited "just food"). She denies diarrhea, last BM was this AM that the patient reports to be normal. Denies CP, SOB, palpations, hematuria, dysuria, melena, BRBPR. Donepezil started 10 days ago, no other recent med changes.
input4: -mother and father passed away from "old age"
